channel.title: Pipelines on TechBlog about OpenShift/Ansible/Satellite and much more
channel.description: Recent content in Pipelines on TechBlog about OpenShift/Ansible/Satellite and much more

item.title: OpenShift Pipelines - Tekton Introduction
item.description: OpenShift Pipelines is a cloud-native, continuous integration and delivery (CI/CD) solution for building pipelines using Tekton. Tekton is a flexible, Kubernetes-native, open-source CI/CD framework that enables automating deployments across multiple platforms (Kubernetes, serverless, VMs, etc) by abstracting away the underlying details. [1]

item.title: YAUB Yet Another Useless Blog
item.description: Welcome to YAUB - Yet Another Useless Blog The articles in this blog shall help to easily test and understand specific issues so they can be reproduced and tested on local environments. You can find the most recent posts on this site or walk through the different categories via the left navigation.
